notes: Luxury modern apartment with high-end finishes including marble floors, open-concept kitchen with built-in appliances, spacious living area, and elegant walk-in closet. The unit is on 9F/15F suggesting elevator access. For baby safety: balcony visible in bedroom with standard railings should be monitored, marble floors may be slippery, but overall the space has minimal sharp corners and appears clean and well-maintained with good natural light.
